channel.title: Thought on Tan Ho
channel.description: Recent content in Thought on Tan Ho

item.title: Two worth living places in Vietnam
item.author: user@example.com (Hugo Author)
item.description: When considering where to live in Vietnam, it is important to define what makes a place “worth living”. Nowadays, remote work is more feasible, especially for software programmers like me. So for me, a worth living place is one that is easy to get around, affordable for living, and offers plenty of opportunities to immerse oneself in nature. Criteria Walking condition If you love to walk, Vietnam can be challenging place to live.

item.title: Start to write
item.author: user@example.com (Hugo Author)
item.description: I am not proficient in language, including my native Vietnamese, so even after years of learning English, I am still struggling to master it. No, the above paragraph is not my original one. It’s the version from ChatGPT. And my second one as well. And … But they don’t matter though, what matters now is that I have decided to start to write a blog. And yes, you should probably know why.
